description: Free online resources, tools and guides to VAT. Learn more about when you must register for VAT (and when you might want to register voluntarily), as well as the VAT rates and thresholds. Get help with when and how to submit your VAT return, as well as with the different types of VAT schemes and processes, including the Flat Rate Scheme, VAT MOSS, postponed accounting, the Annual Accounting Scheme, import VAT, and more.
